HeroSub1: combining design and development expertise to deliver
CardAboutSub: Web developer and designer, always studying to improve my projects and always seeking to deliver an excellent product.
About1: I'm Caio Marianni de Morais, a full-stack developer focused on creating websites and applications that combine attractive design with intuitive usability. I work on both front-end and back-end to deliver complete solutions, aligning aesthetics, functionality, and performance.
About2: My goal is to always capture the user's attention with visually striking and easy-to-navigate interfaces, ensuring a simple and efficient experience.

0.name: Stock Management
0.description1: Product management system within a company. It allows you to view, add, delete, and edit items within the panel/inventory.
0.description2: The application uses a real database system and has login and logout functionality.
0.description3: Inventory is like this: if you don't take care, it doubles the work.

1.name: Horizon Tiny Wiki

1.description2: Developed to improve my data handling skills, clean code, CSS tricks (with Tailwind), and some performance options to make something faster while containing 'heavy' items.

2.name: Thumbnails Portfolio
2.description1: Page to promote my work with Thumbnails for YouTube.

2.description3: It's the thumbnail that fishes; the video just needs to capture.
